Q_NAME: Delete nodes which have a greater value on right side-SLL
Q_DESC:
Given a singly linked list, Write a function to remove all the nodes which have a greater value on right side.

Example:
The list 12->15->10->11->5->6->2->3 should be changed to 15->11->6->3. (Note that 12, 10, 5 and 2 have been deleted because there is a greater value on the right side)

INPUT
First line contains the number of datas- N
Second line contains N integers (linked list).
OUTPUT
Display Customized Linked list.
TESTCASE_1:
5
1 2 6 4 5
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Given linked list
->1->2->6->4->5
Modified Linked List
->6->5
TESTCASE_2:
6
1 5 2 7 9 3
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Given linked list
->1->5->2->7->9->3
Modified Linked List
->9->3
TESTCASE_3:
7
1 6 2 7 3 8 4
###---###SEPERATOR---###---


Given linked list
->1->6->2->7->3->8->4
Modified Linked List
->8->4
TESTCASE_4:
8
7 1 2 3 8 3 9 1 1
###---###SEPERATOR---###---


Given linked list
->7->1->2->3->8->3->9->1
Modified Linked List
->9->1
